Posts.Content:
Hi Jacky - welcome to the forum.
I'm sorry about
 your mom - so young! (I lost my mother at 55 from colon cancer...way too soon!)
Jacky - it is very stressful...but you know that it can be a benign cyst/lump.
It's good you're having the follow up ultrasound and 3d mammogram.
Sending you well-wishes for it to be benign.
Hope you come back to update here.
Moderator, Lyme Forum
Symp started April/2013; Buhner's Lyme May 15-July24/14; Igenex pos. July 3/14
Doxy: July 4-Aug.24/14;Zithro July26-Aug24/14; Amox + Proben. Aug. 29/14; 
added biaxin Sept. 26/14 
Disc. amox,added Ceftin Nov. 20th.; 
Disc. biaxin added Buhner bart herbs Dec/14;Jan/15 pulsing Tinda (w/ Ceftin); 
Abx/herb break Apr-July/15; July-mino; Aug. added Rif; 
Nov./15 mino - to biaxi
Posts.Title: Bad Mammogram

Posts.Content:
Hi Snowflakes - 
I don't know if you realize - but this is a Breast Cancer forum.
Did you mean to post in the MS forum...or Chronic Pain Forum...or Lyme Disease forum?
I'm sorry you are suffering so much and are scared.
I am a Moderator in the Lyme Disease Forum. If you need any information on testing - come over to that forum and we can help you there.
Moderator, Lyme Forum
Symp started April/2013; Buhner's Lyme May 15-July24/14; Igenex pos. July 3/14
Doxy: July 4-Aug.24/14;Zithro July26-Aug24/14; Amox + Proben. Aug. 29/14; added biaxin Sept. 26/14 Disc. amox,added Ceftin Nov. 20th.; Disc. biaxin added Buhner bart herbs Dec/14;Jan/15 pulsing Tinda (w/ Ceftin); Abx/herb break Apr-July/15; July-mino; Aug. added Rif; Nov. switched mino to biaxin.
Posts.Title: Wife diagnosed with BC...im scared, shes scared.
Don't know where else to post.
